title: Plantera Seedling
summaries: The Plantera Seedling is a Hardmode, post-Plantera pet-summoning item that spawns a Plantera Seedling to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Plantera Seedling flies by twirling its petals like a propeller to catch up to them. The Plantera Seedling has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by Plantera in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a newly sprouted Plantera
'Get to the root of the problem.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
